mapper.select: SELECT bookInfo.info_id, title, pub_date, ISBN, amount, publisher, book_category.*, bookInfo.amount - COUNT(book.book_info_id) AS rest FROM bookInfo INNER JOIN book_category ON bookInfo.category_id=book_category.category_id LEFT JOIN book ON bookInfo.info_id = book.book_info_id AND book.returned = 0
